Interface MapCheckers

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapBuilder

    public interface MapCheckers

      Verifies the value provided for the definition of the Map.

    • Method Detail

      • checkAndInstantiateMap

        Map checkAndInstantiateMap(java.lang.String[] aSplitLine)
                    throws ReadFileException
        Verifies the value provided for the definition of the Map.
        Parameters:
        aSplitLine - a split array line with "-" delimiter read from the file
        Returns:
        Map object that represents the Map of the game if definition is valid
        Throws:
        a - ReadFileException if definition is not valid
        ReadFileException

      • checkIfElementCanBeInsertedAndUpdateMap

        Map checkIfElementCanBeInsertedAndUpdateMap(Map gameMap,
                                            AbstractGameElement gameElement,
                                            int atLine,
                                            java.lang.String aLine)
                                     throws ReadFileException
        Verifies if an Element can be inserted in the map at the position provided by his coordinates
        Parameters:
        gameMap - a instance of the current map of the game
        gameElement - that we want to insert in the map
        atLine - the number of the current line read from the input file (for printing clear error messages purposes)
        aLine - the current line read from the input file (for printing clear error messages purposes)
        Returns:
        a Map updated with the new element inserted
        Throws:
        a - ReadFileException if the element can not be inserted at this position because an other element is already define
        ReadFileException
